components.name: Physical Optimizer
components.description: Optimizations which are dependent on runtime

fields.description:
In JoinStatsRule.process the join column statistics are stored in HashMap  joinedColStats, the key used which is the ColStatistics.fqColName is duplicated between join column in the same vertex, as a result distinctVals ends up having duplicated values which negatively affects the join cardinality estimation.

The duplicate keys are usually named KEY.reducesinkkey0.
fields.summary: JoinStatsRule miscalculates join cardinality as incorrect NDV is used due to column names having duplicated fqColumnName

comments.body: This patch uses the tag number in fully qualified column name to disambiguate between same key column names.
